Summary: We will never come back to this hotel. Pool is dirty. Service is not good. The bed is very old. Messy room. We never got what we asked for. The blankets are bad and the rooms are small. Maid service is bad.

Reception was welcoming.  Room was nice and clean.  Bed was comfortable.  There is a TV with a few English speaking channels and Vietnamese channels.  Their was complementary internet but speed was not so great.  There are many Vietnamese restaurants within walking distance.  Taxi cost to Disney was around $25.  Would return for a short stay to visit family and Disney.

Summary Heading: Good Location for first time traveler
Summary: This motel locates in the most busiest corner of Little Saigon. Location is good for first traveler. Mail, shop, foods stores are all nearby. Hotel is clean, reasonable but staffs must be well trained. They are not professional and friendly.

I have stayed here before. Big rooms with clean fresh smell. Good quality at affordable rate.  200 words for a simple review is a bit much but thst is trip advisor for you.  Close to the California beach and mountians. Lots of places to eat.

Summary Heading: Good for Vietnamese folks who don't speak English; average motel
Summary: It's an average motel that caters to visiting Vietnamese. Rooms are in decent shape, there's a pool, but the biggest draw is LOCATION, almost in the heart of Little Saigon. Walking distance to a couple of Vietnamese supermarkets and dozens of restaurants, as well as a Target, Starbucks, Carl's Jr., 99 Cents Only store.
Room tip: Get an upstairs room for less noise.

Summary Heading: Nice hostel in the centre of Little Saigon
Summary: Very good location. Easy to go to many Vietnamese restaurants and shops nearby.  Room and services are standard, nothing special. The charging of the hotel might be overprice.  We stayed here for 2 nights.
